text: == Lords of the Manor of Standish == Portrait of Thomas Strickland Standish (1763-1813) by Joseph Allen. Cecil Marie Roger Widdrington Standish of Standish (1852-1891), brother of Henry Standish. Members of the Standish family who were Lords of the Manor of Standish in Lancashire,Greater Manchester did not come into effect until 1974. Prior to this year, it was all Lancashire are listed below.Ralph de Standish Sheriff of LancashireSir Ralph de Standish (Knighted by Richard II) 1344-1415 {| class="wikitable" |- ! Lordish !!
